questions.question: Appetite:
options: Strong appetite, get irritable if meals are missed
Steady appetite; can skip meals without issues

questions.question: Digestion:
options: Irregular, prone to bloating, and gas
Strong, prone to heartburn or acidity
Slow but steady, can handle heavy foods

questions.question: Sleep Pattern:
options: Moderate sleeper, occasionally wake up at night
Deep sleeper, rarely wake up during the night

questions.question: Emotions:
options: Anxious, worry easily, and have racing thoughts
Quick to anger, driven, and competitive

questions.question: Response to Stress:
options: Stay calm, but can become lethargic or withdrawn

questions.question: Exercise Preference:
options: Prefer gentle, grounding exercises like yoga
Enjoy moderate, competitive exercises like jogging or swimming
